publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2390 Lewis Macdonald: Congratulations to David Florence—That the Parliament congratulates Olympic canoeist, David Florence, a former pupil of Mile End Primary School in Aberdeen, on winning a silver medal for Team GB in the men’s C1 single slalom final; wishes all athletes representing Team GB the best of luck, and looks forward to further success in forthcoming events. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Marlyn Glen*, Elaine Murray*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jackie Baillie*, Ken Macintosh*, Bob Doris*, Karen Gillon*, Sandra White*, Rhona Brankin*, Mary Mulligan*, Bill Butler*, John Park*, David Whitton*, Mary Scanlon*, Johann Lamont*, Jamie Hepburn*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Mike Pringle*, Des McNulty*, Jim Tolson*, Alison McInnes*, Nanette Milne*, James Kelly*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-2390Congratulations to David Florence (lodged on 12 August 2008) Jim Hume*, Jack McConnell*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-2390 Congratulations to David Florence (lodged on 12 August 2008) Robin Harper*
S3M-2390 Congratulations to David Florence (lodged on 12 August 2008) Keith Brown*
S3M-2390 Congratulations to David Florence (lodged on 12 August 2008) Tom McCabe*
